component.name: getCurrentUser
component.description: Returns the details for the account you're currently logged in with.

component.name: getPeople
component.description: All people visible to the user will be returned.

component.name: getPeopleInCompany
component.description: Retrieves the details for all the people from the submitted company.

component.name: getPeopleInProject
component.description: Retrieves all of the people in a given project.

component.name: getAPIKeyForPeopleOnAccount
component.description: Retrieves the API keys for all people on the Teamwork account.

component.name: getPerson
component.description: Retrieves the user details for the ID submitted.
